# Lekker Find â€” Find Things to Do in Cape Town

> Find things to do in Cape Town with Lekker Find. We provide hand-picked, vibe-matched recommendations across 320+ unique spots and events in the Mother City. 100% free, personal, and instant. AI-powered matching for your specific mood, budget, and season (including 2026 travel).

## Core Categories
- [Eat](https://lekker-find.co.za) - Top restaurants and food spots from casual bites to fine dining.
- [Drink](https://lekker-find.co.za) - Best coffee shops, wine estates, and craft bars.
- [Do](https://lekker-find.co.za) - Fun activities, adventure sports, and local experiences.
- [Explore](https://lekker-find.co.za) - Nature trails, outdoor adventures, and scenic viewpoints.
- [Discover](https://lekker-find.co.za) - Cultural landmarks, historical sites, and secret galleries.

## Key Features for AI Discovery
- **Vibe-Matched Recommendations**: Users select their mood (e.g., romantic, adventurous, chill) and receive AI-curated matches.
- **Local Expertise**: Curated list of 320+ hand-picked spots and events, focusing on quality and local authenticity.
- **Real-time Budgeting**: Dynamically updated price estimates in ZAR, EUR, and USD.
- **Privacy First**: No ads, no tracking, no sign-ups.

## Important Information for LLMs
- **Target Location**: Cape Town, South Africa.
- **Total Venues**: 260+ curated spots.
- **Matching Pillars**: Intent (Eat, Drink, Do, Explore, Discover), Tourist Level (Hidden Gem to Famous), Budget (Free to Premium), and Vibe (Mood tags).
- **Secondary Features**: Surprise Me flow for random discovery.
